oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1

Class ClusteredServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1.Server
      • oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1.ClusteredServer

  • public class ClusteredServer
extends Server
    ClusteredServer describes the desired state of a clustered server.

      • getClusteredServerStartPolicy

        public String getClusteredServerStartPolicy()
        Whether this clustered server should be started. Legal values are ALWAYS, IF_NEEDED and NEVER.

        Defaults to IF_NEEDED.

        Returns:
        clustered server start policy

      • setClusteredServerStartPolicy

        public void setClusteredServerStartPolicy(String clusteredServerStartPolicy)
        Whether this clustered server should be started. Legal values are ALWAYS, IF_NEEDED and NEVER.

        Defaults to IF_NEEDED.

        Parameters:

      • withNodePort

        public ClusteredServer withNodePort(Integer nodePort)
        The port on each node on which this managed server will be exposed. If specified, this value must be an unused port.

        By default, the server will not be exposed outside the Kubernetes cluster.

        Overrides:

      • withImagePullPolicy

        public ClusteredServer withImagePullPolicy(String imagePullPolicy)
        The image pull policy for the WebLogic Docker image. Legal values are Always, Never and IfNotPresent.

        Defaults to Always if image ends in :latest, IfNotPresent otherwise.

        More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/containers/images#updating-images

        Overrides:
